title: 97/628/EC: Commission Decision of 28 July 1997 amending Decision 93/70/EEC on codification for the message 'Animo' (Text with EEA relevance)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 28 July 1997 amending Decision 93/70/EEC on codification for the message 'Animo` (Text with EEA relevance) (97/628/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The Annex to Decision 93/70/EEC is replaced by the Annex hereto.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 28 July 1997.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission

ANNEX
'ANNEX
An Animo code shall be made up of the code in Title I, column 1, if necessary supplemented by the codes in Titles II and III the references to which are set out in columns 2 and 3 of Title I respectively.
TITLE I
General definition of the live animals, semen, ova and embryos and products of animal origin in the Animo data file.
